original_text:
Extra Juicy
Informazioni generali
Software: Pragmatic Play
Rulli: 5
Linee di gioco: 10
Importo minimo della puntata: 0,10 €
Importo massimo della puntata: 50 €
Return to Player (RTP): 96,5%
Volatilità: medio-alta
Caratteristiche principali
Nel catalogo della Pragmatic Play abbiamo fatto un po’ di fatica a trovare una slot machine che richiamasse le vecchie macchine da gioco terrestri: sebbene infatti siano presenti diversi giochi a tre rulli, con caratteristiche quindi “old school”, Extra Juicy è forse l’unica che per stile, grafica e gameplay ricordi veramente le tradizionali Fruit Machine.
Se quindi siete dei nostalgici delle sale da gioco e cercate una slot classica anche tra quelle di questo provider, be’, Extra Juicy è proprio quello che fa per voi!
Non fatevi ingannare però dal gusto retrò di questo gioco: accanto a una grafica molto tradizionale offre un gameplay abbastanza articolato e con una volatilità medio-alta vi dà la possibilità di ottenere delle vincite niente male!
Innanzitutto sono presenti cinque rulli, non i classici tre, e ben 10 linee di puntata, con un range di scommessa che va da 0,10 fino a 50 €, abbiamo poi la possibilità di usufruire di moltiplicatori e giri bonus che aumentano le chance di vincita e infine, possiamo giocare anche in modalità Autoplay, dopo aver impostato il numero di giri e gli importi massimi di vincita e di perdita.
I simboli di Extra Juicy
Come ogni Fruit Machine che si rispetti, anche Extra Juicy prevede che i suoi simboli siano rappresentati da dei coloratissimi frutti: abbiamo le ciliegie (le classiche cherries che per tanto tempo sono state l’icona delle slot machine), i limoni, le arance, le prugne, e i cocomeri, oltre che la tradizionale campana sempre presente in questo tipo di slot.
Il simbolo che paga di meno è quello con le ciliegie, mentre quello che ha più valore è la campana; potete consultare comunque la tabella dei pagamenti prima di iniziare a giocare per scoprire il valore di ogni simbolo.
Un grosso e scintillante diamante rappresenta lo Scatter del gioco: compare solo sui rulli dispari (1, 3 e 5) e permette di accedere a tanti giri gratis e a un moltiplicatore progressivo.
Fruit machine: un classico senza tempo
Se questa tipologia di slot machine non smette di esercitare un fascino su di voi, allora dovreste provarne anche delle altre tra quelle presenti nel catalogo dei vari provider.
Ne citiamo solo alcune, ma se avrete voglia di fare una piccola ricerca online, scoprirete che ce ne sono davvero per tutti i gusti, da quelle con impostazione più classica, fino alle rivisitazioni in chiave moderna.
Una di queste con uno stile molto classico è Super Fruit 7, che riproduce proprio la grafica delle vecchie slot terrestri, con i frutti, i 7 e i simboli BAR; se invece volete provare una simpatica variazione sul tema, vi consigliamo Don Corlimone, in cui frutta e verdure assumono le sembianze di una banda di gangster nella New York degli anni ’20.
Segnaliamo infine Fruit Shop, con una grafica molto vivace in stile cartone animato, che prevede anche una versione natalizia chiamata Fruit Shop Christmas Edition.

raw_translation.response:
Extra Juicy
General Information
Software: Pragmatic Play
Reels: 5
Paylines: 10
Minimum bet amount: €0.10
Maximum bet amount: €50
Return to Player (RTP): 96.5%
Volatility: Medium to high
Main Features
In Pragmatic Play's catalog, we had a bit of a hard time finding a slot machine that harks back to the old land-based gaming machines: although there are several three-reel games that are therefore "old school", Extra Juicy may be the only one that, in terms of style, graphics and gameplay, really recalls the traditional Fruit Machine.
So if you're a nostalgic for gaming halls and looking for a classic slot even among those from this provider, well, Extra Juicy is just what you need!
But don't be fooled by the retro taste of this game: alongside a very traditional graphics, it offers a quite complex gameplay and with medium to high volatility it gives you the chance to win some nice prizes!
First of all, there are five reels, not the classic three, and ten paylines, with a betting range that goes from €0.10 up to €50. Then we have the chance to take advantage of multipliers and bonus spins that increase the chances of winning and, finally, we can also play in Autoplay mode, after setting the number of spins and the maximum win and loss amounts.
The symbols of Extra Juicy
Like any respectable Fruit Machine, Extra Juicy provides that its symbols are represented by colorful fruits: we have cherries (the classic cherries that for so long were the icon of slot machines), lemons, oranges, plums, and watermelons, as well as the traditional bell always present in this type of slot.
The symbol that pays the least is the one with cherries, while the one with the highest value is the bell; you can consult the paytable before starting to play to discover the value of each symbol.
A big and shining diamond represents the game's scatter symbol: it appears only on odd reels (1, 3, and 5) and allows you to access many free spins and a progressive multiplier.
Fruit machines: a timeless classic
If this type of slot machine never stops exerting a charm on you, then you should also try some of the others in the catalog of various providers.
We only mention a few, but if you feel like doing a little online research, you will discover that there really are ones for all tastes, from those with a more classic setting, to modern reinterpretations.
One of these with a very classic style is Super Fruit 7, which faithfully reproduces the graphics of old land-based slots, with fruits, 7s, and BAR symbols; if instead you want to try a fun variation on the theme, we recommend Don Corlimone, where fruits and vegetables take on the appearance of a gang of gangsters in 1920s New York.
Lastly, we point out Fruit Shop, with a very lively cartoon-style graphics, which also includes a Christmas version called Fruit Shop Christmas Edition.

raw_translation.response:
Extra Juicy - A Classic Slot Game from Pragmatic Play

Are you a seasoned gambler looking for a classic slot game? Look no further than Extra Juicy from Pragmatic Play.

With its traditional fruit machine visuals and gameplay, Extra Juicy is the perfect game for those who want to relive the glory days of slot gaming. But don't be fooled by its retro appearance - this game offers plenty of opportunities to win big.

With 5 reels and 10 paylines, players can bet as little as €0.10 or as much as €50, making it accessible for players of all levels. Extra Juicy also includes multipliers and bonus spins, further increasing your chances of winning big.

The symbols in Extra Juicy are as colorful as they are classic - from cherries to watermelons, with traditional bell symbols and a sparkling diamond scatter symbol that appears on odd reels, triggering free spins and progressive multipliers.

If you're looking for other classic slot games to try out, we recommend Super Fruit 7 for a true vintage feel, or Don Corlimone for a fun spin on the classic fruit theme. Fruit Shop also offers a cheerful, cartoonish take on the fruit machine genre, complete with a festive Christmas edition.

Overall, Extra Juicy is a game that combines tradition with modern gameplay, giving players the best of both worlds. So, why not give it a spin and see what you can win?

response.headline: RTP and volatility
response.content: Extra Juicy features an RTP of 96.5% and medium to high volatility. With relatively frequent but smaller payouts, its bonus features contribute to some nice prizes for the players.

response.headline: Bet limits and paylines
response.content: Extra Juicy allows players to bet from a minimum of €0.10 to a maximum of €50. The game features ten paylines and allows players to choose the desired number of paylines to bet on.

response.headline: Symbols and payouts
response.content: As with any fruit machine, the symbols in Extra Juicy include a variety of colorful fruits such as cherries, lemons, oranges, plums, and watermelons. The traditional bell is also among the symbols, paid as the highest value symbol. The diamond symbol represents the game's scatter and appears only on odd reels. The paytable shows the value of each symbol, with cherries having the lowest value. The scatter symbol enables players to trigger free spins and a progressive multiplier.

Review: Extra Juicy
General Information
Software: Pragmatic Play
Reels: 5
Paylines: 10
Minimum bet amount: €0.10
Maximum bet amount: €50
Return to Player (RTP): 96.5%
Volatility: Medium to high
Main Features
In Pragmatic Play's catalog, we had a bit of a hard time finding a slot machine that harks back to the old land-based gaming machines: although there are several three-reel games that are therefore "old school", Extra Juicy may be the only one that, in terms of style, graphics and gameplay, really recalls the traditional Fruit Machine.
So if you're a nostalgic for gaming halls and looking for a classic slot even among those from this provider, well, Extra Juicy is just what you need!
But don't be fooled by the retro taste of this game: alongside a very traditional graphics, it offers a quite complex gameplay and with medium to high volatility it gives you the chance to win some nice prizes!
First of all, there are five reels, not the classic three, and ten paylines, with a betting range that goes from €0.10 up to €50. Then we have the chance to take advantage of multipliers and bonus spins that increase the chances of winning and, finally, we can also play in Autoplay mode, after setting the number of spins and the maximum win and loss amounts.
The symbols of Extra Juicy
Like any respectable Fruit Machine, Extra Juicy provides that its symbols are represented by colorful fruits: we have cherries (the classic cherries that for so long were the icon of slot machines), lemons, oranges, plums, and watermelons, as well as the traditional bell always present in this type of slot.
The symbol that pays the least is the one with cherries, while the one with the highest value is the bell; you can consult the paytable before starting to play to discover the value of each symbol.
A big and shining diamond represents the game's scatter symbol: it appears only on odd reels (1, 3, and 5) and allows you to access many free spins and a progressive multiplier.
Fruit machines: a timeless classic
If this type of slot machine never stops exerting a charm on you, then you should also try some of the others in the catalog of various providers.
We only mention a few, but if you feel like doing a little online research, you will discover that there really are ones for all tastes, from those with a more classic setting, to modern reinterpretations.
One of these with a very classic style is Super Fruit 7, which faithfully reproduces the graphics of old land-based slots, with fruits, 7s, and BAR symbols; if instead you want to try a fun variation on the theme, we recommend Don Corlimone, where fruits and vegetables take on the appearance of a gang of gangsters in 1920s New York.
Lastly, we point out Fruit Shop, with a very lively cartoon-style graphics, which also includes a Christmas version called Fruit Shop Christmas Edition.

Extra Juicy isn't just a feast for the eyes, with its juicy graphics and vibrant colors - it's a game that's easy to play. Gameplay mechanics and features

Extra Juicy, a slot game by Pragmatic Play, follows the traditional fruit machine style with five reels and ten paylines. The betting range starts from €0.10 and goes up to €50. The game offers multipliers and bonus spins increasing the chances of winning. Players can also play in Autoplay mode after setting the number of spins and the maximum win and loss amounts.

RTP and volatility

Extra Juicy features an RTP of 96.5% and medium to high volatility. With relatively frequent but smaller payouts, its bonus features contribute to some nice prizes for the players.

Bet limits and paylines

Extra Juicy allows players to bet from a minimum of €0.10 to a maximum of €50. The game features ten paylines and allows players to choose the desired number of paylines to bet on.

Symbols and payouts

As with any fruit machine, the symbols in Extra Juicy include a variety of colorful fruits such as cherries, lemons, oranges, plums, and watermelons. The traditional bell is also among the symbols, paid as the highest value symbol. The diamond symbol represents the game's scatter and appears only on odd reels. The paytable shows the value of each symbol, with cherries having the lowest value. The scatter symbol enables players to trigger free spins and a progressive multiplier.

Comparison with other fruit machines

Extra Juicy stands out among other fruit machines with its traditional style and complex gameplay. Other games, such as Super Fruit 7, Don Corlimone, and Fruit Shop, offer different variations ranging from classic to modern slots, with each game providing a unique gaming experience. Players can explore various fruit machines to choose the one that suits their preferences the most.

Like any respectable Fruit Machine, Extra Juicy provides that its symbols are represented by colorful fruits: we have cherries (the classic cherries that for so long were the icon of slot machines), lemons, oranges, plums, and watermelons, as well as the traditional bell always present in this type of slot.
The symbol that pays the least is the one with cherries, while the one with the highest value is the bell; you can consult the paytable before starting to play to discover the value of each symbol.
A big and shining diamond represents the game's scatter symbol: it appears only on odd reels (1, 3, and 5) and allows you to access many free spins and a progressive multiplier.
Fruit machines: a timeless classic
If this type of slot machine never stops exerting a charm on you, then you should also try some of the others in the catalog of various providers.
We only mention a few, but if you feel like doing a little online research, you will discover that there really are ones for all tastes, from those with a more classic setting, to modern reinterpretations.
One of these with a very classic style is Super Fruit 7, which faithfully reproduces the graphics of old land-based slots, with fruits, 7s, and BAR symbols; if instead you want to try a fun variation on the theme, we recommend Don Corlimone, where fruits and vegetables take on the appearance of a gang of gangsters in 1920s New York.
Lastly, we point out Fruit Shop, with a very lively cartoon-style graphics, which also includes a Christmas version called Fruit Shop Christmas Edition.
